properties.displayName: Inherit tag Environment from the resource group & overwrite existing
properties.description: Overwrites the specified mandatory tag Environment and existing value using the RG's tag value. Applicable when any Resource containing the mandatory tag Environment is created or updated. Ignores scenarios where tag values are the same for both Resource and RG, or when the RG's tag value is one of the parameters('tagValuesToIgnore'). Existing resources can be remediated by triggering a remediation task.

metadata.description: Name of the tag, such as 'Environment'
A list of tag values to ignore when evaluating tag inheritance from the RG
metadata.displayName: Tag values to ignore for inheritance
